name: Credit Card
description: This is a payment form component with beautiful interface of credit cards.

properties.name: cardPreviewVisibility
properties.label: Card Preview Visibility
properties.settingTooltip: Select to display a preview of the credit card.
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic determine if the credit card preview should be visible.

properties.name: cvcVisibility
properties.label: CVC Visibility
properties.settingTooltip: Select to display digits of the credit card CVC number.
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic determine if the CVC number should be visible. If the handler returns 'false' digits will be hidden.

properties.name: labelsVisibility
properties.label: Labels Visibility
properties.settingTooltip: Select to display labels of the form fields.
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic determine if the labels of the form fields should be visible.

properties.name: submitButtonLabel
properties.label: Submit Button Label
properties.settingTooltip: Define the label of the submit button.
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the label of the submit button.

properties.name: cardholderNameFieldVisibility
properties.label: Cardholder Name Field Visibility
properties.settingTooltip: Select to display the cardholder name field.
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic determine if the cardholder name field should be visible.

properties.name: cardNumberFieldPlaceholder
properties.label: Card Number Field Placeholder
properties.settingTooltip: Define the placeholder for the card number field.
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the placeholder for the card number entry field.

properties.name: cardholderNameFieldPlaceholder
properties.label: Cardholder Name Field Placeholder
properties.settingTooltip: Define the placeholder for the cardholder name field.
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the placeholder for the cardholder name entry field.

properties.name: expiryFieldPlaceholder
properties.label: Expiry Field Placeholder
properties.settingTooltip: Define the placeholder for the card expiration field.
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the placeholder for the card expiration entry field.

properties.name: cvcFieldPlaceholder
properties.label: CVC Field Placeholder
properties.settingTooltip: Define the placeholder for the CVC number field.
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the placeholder for the CVC entry field.

properties.name: initialCardNumber
properties.label: Initial Card Number
properties.settingTooltip: Define the initial value for the card number field.
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the initial value for the card number entry field.

properties.name: initialCardholderName
properties.label: Initial Cardholder Name
properties.settingTooltip: Define the initial value for the cardholder name field.
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the initial value for the cardholder name entry field.

properties.name: initialExpiry
properties.label: Initial Expiry
properties.settingTooltip: Define the initial value for the card expiration field in 'MM/YY' format.
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the initial value for the card expiration entry field. Set expiration in 'MM/YY' format.

properties.name: initialCVC
properties.label: Initial CVC
properties.settingTooltip: Define the initial value for the CVC number field.
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the initial value for the CVC number entry field.

eventHandlers.name: onSubmit
eventHandlers.label: On Submit Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the card form is submitted.

eventHandlers.name: onSuccess
eventHandlers.label: On Success Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the payment is complete.

eventHandlers.name: onReject
eventHandlers.label: On Reject Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the payment fails.

eventHandlers.name: onFocus
eventHandlers.label: On Focus Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the Card Form gains focus.

eventHandlers.name: onBlur
eventHandlers.label: On Blur Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the Card Form loses focus.
